videos.title: We're Going on a Sleigh Ride Hunt Song - The Kiboomers Christmas Songs for Kids
videos.description:
This year, make sure you join the Christmas fun with We're Going on a Sleigh Ride Hunt song by The Kiboomers. So put on your coat, pick up your woolly hat, and join us for a festive sleigh ride!

We’re Going on a Sleigh Ride Hunt song lyrics for kids

We’re going on a sleigh ride
We’re going on a sleigh ride
I’ve got my winter boots on
I’ve got my winter boots on
I love snow!
I love snow!

Ooh! 
Look at that big frozen pond!
It’s so big!!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We can’t go under it
We have to have to skate across it!
We have to have to skate across it!
Skate! Skate! Skate! Skate!

We’re going on a sleigh ride
We’re going on a sleigh ride
I’ve got my winter boots on
I’ve got my winter boots on
I love snow!
I love snow!

Oh look! It’s a steep hill!
It’s so steep!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We can’t go under it
We have to ski down it!
We have to ski down it!
Ski! Ski! Ski! Ski!

We’re going on a sleigh ride
We’re going on a sleigh ride
I’ve got my winter boots on
I’ve got my winter boots on
I love snow!I love snow!

Oh look! It’s a huge, deep snow bank!
It’s so deep!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We can’t go under it
We have to dig through it!
We have to dig through it!
Dig! Dig! Dig! Dig!

We’re going on a sleigh ride
We’re going on a sleigh ride
I’ve got my winter boots on
I’ve got my winter boots on
I love snow!I love snow!

Oh look! It’s mom!
Hi Mom!
Hurry home! We’re about to unwrap the presents!
Let’s go!!

Hurry! 
Back through the deep snow bank!
Dig! Dig! Dig! Dig!

Back up the steep hill!
Ski! Ski! Ski! Ski!

Back across the big frozen pond!
Skate! Skate! Skate! Skate!

Into the sleigh!
Quick! 
Across the yard!
Up the stairs!
Into the house!
Close the door!

Hey! What happened to Santa?
What took you so long?
Um, it’s a long story…
Merry Christmas!

Animation done by Dream Farm Studio

videos.title: Santa Says Christmas Song by The Kiboomers - Simon Says Follow the Leader Songs
videos.description:
Do you have a favorite Christmas song? Well, adding Santa Says to your kids playlist is a great way to prepare for the holidays! With this fun action game, children can sing along while they try and win the game. If your kids love Simon Says, then they will love playing and singing along to this easy to follow children's Christmas game. 

The Kiboomers have a whole bunch of fun Christmas songs that are perfect for sing-alongs. From Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer to Frosty the Snowman, this game is sure to get you in the Christmas spirit! So grab your kids and get ready to sing along with Santa Says!

Santa Says song lyrics for kids

Let’s play Santa Says!
When you hear me say “Santa Says Skate”
Then you skate!
But, if I don’t say “Santa Says” first, don’t move!
And that’s how we play the game

Are you ready?

Santa says,Skate!
Santa says, Throw snowballs!
Santa says, Run!
Santa says, Build a snowman!
Take off your boots!
Only move when Santa says!
Only move when Santa says!
Let’s do it again!

Santa says,Go Tobogganing!
Santa says, Build a snow fort!
Wave your mittens!
Only move when Santa says!
Only move when Santa says!

Let’s do it again!

Santa says, Catch snowflakes!
Santa says, Ride a sled!
Santa says, Play hockey!
Ski!

Only move when Santa says!

Only move when Santa says!

Let’s do it again!

Santa says, Decorate a tree!
Jump in the snow!
Only move when Santa says!
Only move when Santa says!

Let’s do it again!

Santa says, Make a snow angel!
Santa says, Shovel snow!
Shout hooray!

Only move when Santa says!

Five little penguins jumping on the bed

videos.title: Valentine Hokey Pokey Song - The Kiboomers Valentine's Day song for Preschoolers #shorts
videos.description:
Looking for a special way to celebrate Valentine's Day with your kids? Check out our fun Valentine Hokey Pokey song! This song will get kids moving and having fun.

The Kiboomers is a family-friendly music group that specializes in creating fun and educational music videos for kids. Our Valentine Hokey Pokey song is the perfect way to get your kids moving and having fun during this special day!

Valentine Hokey Pokey song lyrics for kids 

Hug!
You put your right arm out
You put your left arm out
Cross your arms around your body 
And you squeeze with all your might! 
Do the Valentine Pokey
And you spread the love around 
That’s what this day’s about!

Make a heart!
You put your right hand up 
You put your left hand up
You bring your hands together 
And you make a little heart! 
Do the Valentine Pokey
And you spread the love around 
That’s what this day’s about!

Blow a kiss!
You put your right hand up
You pucker up your lips
You touch your hand to your lips 
And you blow a little kiss!
Do the Valentine Pokey
And you spread the love around 
That’s what this day’s about!

Hold hands!
You put your right hand out 
You put your left hand out 
You reach out to your buddies 
And we all hold hands!
Do the Valentine Pokey
And you spread the love around 
That’s what this day’s about!

videos.title: Going on a Yeti Hunt! Join the adventure with The Kiboomers Song for Preschoolers #shorts
videos.description:
Join The Kiboomers on their latest adventure - "Going on a Yeti Hunt!" In this music adventure, the Kiboomers set out to find a yeti.

This song for kids is the perfect way to get your child excited for the adventure ahead. With catchy lyrics and an upbeat tune, this song is sure to get your child singing along. Join The Kiboomers on their latest adventure and watch them as they go on a Yeti Hunt!

 We're Going on a Yeti Hunt song lyrics for kids

We’re going on a yeti hunt
We’re going to find a big one With great big feet
And white shaggy fur
Oh my! It’s a snowstorm!
Uh-oh!!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We have to crawl through it! We’re gonna have to crawl!
Crawl, Crawl, Crawl, Crawl...
Verse 2
We’re going on a yeti hunt
We’re going to find a big one With great big feet
And white shaggy fur
It’s a frozen river!
Brrrrrrr!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We have to crawl through it!
We’re gonna have to skate across it! Weee!!
Skate! Skate! Skate! Skate!

 Verse 3
We’re going on a yeti hunt
We’re going to find a big one With great big feet
And white shaggy fur
It’s an ice glacier!
Oh no!!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We have to crawl through it! We have to stomp across it! Get ready to stomp!
Stomp! Stomp! Stomp! Stomp!
Verse 4
We’re going on a yeti hunt
We’re going to find a big one With great big feet
And white shaggy fur
Uh oh! What’s that?
I don’t know!!
I see two big feet!
I see white, shaggy, fur!
Hmm, I wonder what it is? I know what that is!!
You do?
It’s a yeti!!!
Would you like an ice cream? Ice cream?
Hmmmm! Yummy!

videos.title: Valentine Hokey Pokey Song - The Kiboomers Valentine's Day Songs for Preschoolers
videos.description:
Looking for a special way to celebrate Valentine's Day with your kids? Check out our fun Valentine Hokey Pokey song! This song will get kids moving and having fun.

The Kiboomers is a family-friendly music group that specializes in creating fun and educational music videos for kids. Our Valentine Hokey Pokey song is the perfect way to get your kids moving and having fun during this special day!

Valentine Hokey Pokey song lyrics for kids 

Hug!
You put your right arm out
You put your left arm out
Cross your arms around your body 
And you squeeze with all your might! 
Do the Valentine Pokey
And you spread the love around 
That’s what this day’s about!

Make a heart!
You put your right hand up 
You put your left hand up
You bring your hands together 
And you make a little heart! 
Do the Valentine Pokey
And you spread the love around 
That’s what this day’s about!

Blow a kiss!
You put your right hand up
You pucker up your lips
You touch your hand to your lips 
And you blow a little kiss!
Do the Valentine Pokey
And you spread the love around 
That’s what this day’s about!

Hold hands!
You put your right hand out 
You put your left hand out 
You reach out to your buddies 
And we all hold hands!
Do the Valentine Pokey
And you spread the love around 
That’s what this day’s about!

videos.title: Magic Words Song  - The Kiboomers Please and Thank You Songs for Preschoolers - Good Manners
videos.description:
In this fun and educational song, the Kiboomers teach kids good manners in a fun and engaging way. They explain the magic words - may i, please, thank you, and sorry - and provide a catchy song that kids will love to sing along to.

Learning can be fun, and with this song, the Kiboomers have made learning easier than ever! 

Magic Words song lyrics for kids :

Magic Words

Oh, be polite
Use magic words!
Magic words!
Magic words!
Oh, be polite
Use magic words
Every single day!

If you need to go to the bathroom, say may I
Say, “May I?”Say, “May I?”
If you need to go, say may I
Use the magic words!
The little girl asks the teacher: 
May I go to the bathroom?
The teacher smiles:Yes you may!

If you want a cookie, just say please!
Just say, “Please!”
Just say, “Please!”
If you want a cookie just say please!
Use the magic word!
The little boy asks his dad a question:
May I have a cookie, please?
The dad reaches into the cookie jar and says:
Sure!

If you get a cookie say thank you!
Say, “Thank you!”
Say, “Thank you!”
If you get a cookie say thank you!
Use the magic words!
The little boy smiles:
Thank you!
The dad says:You’re welcome!

If you burp or fart, say excuse me!
Say, “Excuse me!”
Say, “Excuse me!”
If you burp or fart, say excuse me!
Use the magic words!
The little boy farts and says:
Excuse me!
The little girl smiles and says:
That’s ok!
Then she burps and they both laugh:
Excuse me!

If you make someone cry, say I’m sorry!
Say, “I’m sorry!”
Say, “I’m sorry!”
If you make someone cry, say I’m sorry!
Use the magic words!
The little boy says:
I’m sorry!
The little girl wipes her nose and says:
It’s ok!

Oh, be polite
Use magic words!
Magic words!
Magic words!
Oh, be polite
Use magic words
Every single day!
The little boy and girl smile and say:
Every single day!

Animation done by Dream Farm Studio

videos.title: Going on a Yeti Hunt - Winter Movement Songs For Preschoolers by The Kiboomers
videos.description:
Join The Kiboomers on their latest adventure - "Going on a Yeti Hunt!" In this music adventure, the Kiboomers set out to find a yeti.

This circle time activity song for kids is the perfect way to get your child excited for the adventure ahead. With catchy lyrics and an upbeat tune, this song is sure to get your preschoolers singing along. Join The Kiboomers on their latest adventure and watch them as they go on a Yeti Hunt!

 We're Going on a Yeti Hunt song lyrics for kids

We’re going on a yeti hunt
We’re going to find a big one 
With great big feet
And white shaggy fur
Oh my! 
It’s a snowstorm!
Uh-oh!!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We have to crawl through it! 
We’re gonna have to crawl!
Crawl, Crawl, Crawl, Crawl...

We’re going on a yeti hunt
We’re going to find a big one 
With great big feet
And white shaggy fur
It’s a frozen river!
Brrrrrrr!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We have to crawl through it!
We’re gonna have to skate across it! 
Weee!!
Skate! Skate! Skate! Skate!

We’re going on a yeti hunt
We’re going to find a big one 
With great big feet
And white shaggy fur
It’s an ice glacier!
Oh no!!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We have to crawl through it! 
We have to stomp across it! 
Get ready to stomp!
Stomp! Stomp! Stomp! Stomp!

We’re going on a yeti hunt
We’re going to find a big one With great big feet
And white shaggy fur
Uh oh! What’s that?
I don’t know!!
I see two big feet!
I see white, shaggy, fur!
Hmm, I wonder what it is? 
I know what that is!!
You do?
It’s a yeti!!!
Would you like an ice cream? 
Ice cream?
Hmmmm! Yummy!

videos.description:
It's time to get active with your preschoolers and The Kiboomers ! We're playing the animal freeze game, and first up is the cat stretch. Stretch around the room, but remember to freeze when we say FREEZE. Get your body moving and have a blast with this interactive freeze dance. Don't forget to hit that subscribe button to join us for more adventures!

Animal Freeze Dance 2 song lyrics for kids :

Let’s play the animal freeze game! 
First, let’s stretch like cats!
But remember to stop
When I say freeze!

Stretch! Stretch!
Cats stretch!
Stretch around the room! 
Cats stretch around the room!
But stop when I say, Freeze! 

Get ready to run like horses!

Run! Run!
Horses run
Run around the room! 
Horses run around the room!
But stop when I say, Freeze! 

Get ready to wiggle like worms!

Wiggle! Wiggle!
Worms wiggle
Wiggle around the room! 
Worms wiggle around the room!
But stop when I say, Freeze!

Get ready to fly like birds!

Fly! Fly!
Birds fly
Fly around the room 
Birds fly around the room
But stop when I say, Freeze! 

Get ready to jump like frogs!

Jump! Jump!
Frogs jump
Jump around the room! 
Frogs jump around the room!
But stop when I say, Freeze!

videos.title: Saint Patrick's Day Freeze Dance Game - The Kiboomers Songs for Preschoolers #shorts
videos.description:
Get ready for some St. Patrick's Day fun! Join in on the freeze dance game and see if you can keep up when the Leprechaun says freeze. And when it's time to dance like a leprechaun, let loose and show off your best moves. Don't forget to subscribe for more brain breaks for St 
Patrick's Day like this!

 St Patrick’s Day Freeze Dance song lyrics for kids

Hello me little leprechauns!
Let's play the St Patrick’s Freeze Dance game! 
Now remember, when I say Freeze - FREEZE!! 
And when I say dance - DANCE!

Dancing Dancing all around 
Dancing leprechauns
Dancing any way you please 
But STOP when I say FREEZE

Everybody, get ready to slide down the rainbow!

Sliding, sliding all around 
Sliding down the rainbow 
Sliding any way you please 
But STOP when I say FREEZE

Everybody, get ready to hop over the pot of gold!

Hopping Hopping all around 
Over the pot of gold
Hopping any way you please 
But STOP when I say FREEZE

Everybody, let’s search for a four leaf clover!

Searching searching all around 
For a four leaf clover 
Searching any way you please 
But STOP when I say FREEZE

videos.title: Going on a Square Hunt - The Kiboomers Shapes Songs for Preschoolers
videos.description:
Come join us on a thrilling adventure as we hunt for squares! With our trusty binoculars, we'll search high and low for these four-sided wonders. From pizza boxes to picture frames, we'll discover squares in unexpected places. Don't miss out on the excitement - subscribe now and let's embark on a square hunt together!

Square Hunt song lyrics for kids :

We’re Going on a Square Hunt

We’re going on a square hunt!
We’re going on a square hunt!
I’ve got my binoculars!
I’ve got my binoculars!
Where to look?
Where to look?
Oh look! There’s one now!
Where?

I’ll give you a hint!
It’s the color white
It’s the color white
It smells really tasty!
It smells really tasty!
It has four sides!
It has four sides!
It’s the pizza box!!
It’s a square!!!
 
We’re going on a square hunt!
We’re going on a square hunt!
I’ve got my binoculars!
I’ve got my binoculars!
Where to look?
Where to look?
Oh look! There’s one now!
Where?

I’ll give you a hint!
It’s on the wall!
It’s on the wall!
I can see through it!
I can see through it!
It has four sides!
It has four sides!
It’s a window!!
It’s a square!!!

We’re going on a square hunt!
We’re going on a square hunt!
I’ve got my binoculars!
I’ve got my binoculars!
Where to look?
Where to look?
Oh look! There’s one now!
Where?

I’ll give you a hint!
It’s hanging on the wall!
It’s hanging on the wall!
And in it is a picture!
And in it is a picture!
It has four sides!
It has four sides!
It’s a picture frame!!

It’s a square!!!

We’re going on a square hunt!
We’re going on a square hunt!
I’ve got my binoculars!
I’ve got my binoculars!
Where to look?
Where to look?
Oh look! There’s one now!
Where?

I’ll give you a hint!
It’s in the classroom!
It’s in the classroom!
It’s covered with letters!
It’s covered with letters!
It has four sides!
It has four sides!
It’s a toy block!!
It’s a square!!!

Today we hunted squares!
Today we hunted squares!
And what did we find?
And what did we find?
A pizza box!
A window!
A picture frame! A toy block!
Squares!! Yay!

videos.title: Hop a Little Easter Bunny Song with The Kiboomers! #shorts
videos.description:
Get your little ones moving and singing with the Kiboomers' "Hop a Little Jump a Little Bunny" song! This lively tune is perfect for preschoolers and is a great addition to any Easter playlist. Watch and sing along with your little bunnies as they hop and jump to the beat!

Hop a little Jump a little Bunny song lyrics for kids :

Stand up everyone and let’s get ready to moooove!

Hop a little, jump a little
One, two, three;
Run a little, skip a little
Tap your knee;
Bend a little, stretch a little,
Four, five six:
Twirl a little, bounce a little
Pick up sticks
Dance a little, tap a little
Seven, eight, nine
Stomp a little, march a little
Stand in line
Go a little, stop a little
Count to 10

Shake a little, clap a little,
Start again!

Go back to the beginning and...
Start again!

videos.title: Let’s do the Feelings and Emotions Freeze Dance with The Kiboomers #shorts
videos.description:
Get your preschoolers up and moving with this fun emotions freeze dance game from The Kiboomers! This high-energy movement song for preschoolers will have them dancing and learning about emotions at the same time. Perfect for music and movement activities in the classroom or at home. Let's get ready to dance and express our feelings and emotions with The Kiboomers

Hey everyone, don't forget to click Subscribe if you want more music videos from The Kiboomers!

Emotions Freeze Dance Game song lyrics for kids

It’s the Feelings Freeze Dance
Let’s dance our feelings!
Now remember! 
When I say “Freeze”, 
freeze!
And when I say “Do the Happy Dance”
Dance!!

Happy dance all around the room
Happy, Happy, Happy!
Happy dance anyway you please
But stop when I say freeze!

Now, let’s do a Sad Dance!
Sad dance all around the room
Sad, Sad, Sad!
Sad dance anyway you please
But stop when I say freeze!

Now, let’s do an Angry Dance!
Angry dance all around the room
Angry, Angry, Angry!
Angry dance anyway you please
But stop when I say freeze!

Now, let’s do a Silly Dance!
Silly dance all around the room
Silly, Silly, Silly!
Silly dance anyway you please
But stop when I say… freeze

Animation done by Dream Farm Studio

videos.title: Pass the Bean Bag Songs for Preschoolers - The Kiboomers Freeze Dance Game
videos.description:
Pass the Bean Bag Songs for Preschoolers Freeze Game: Get ready to have a blast with this fun circle activity for kids! Join us as we play pass the bean bag, where you'll have to freeze when we say freeze and pass the bean bag hand to hand when we say pass. It's a game that will keep you on your toes and provide endless laughter. Don't forget to subscribe to The Kiboomers for more exciting games and activities like this one!

♥︎ If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then please subscribe to support our YouTube channel here : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Pass the Bean Bag Freeze Game song lyrics for kids :

Let's play the Pass the Beanbag Freeze Game! Now remember, when I say, “Freeze!” you... “FREEZE!”
And when I say “Pass the beanbag!”
You...
“PASS THE BEANBAG!”
Pass the beanbag hand to hand Round and round the circle Pass the beanbag all around But STOP when I say....
FREEZE!
Now, pass the beanbag higher!
Pass the beanbag hand to hand Round and round the circle Pass it higher all around
But STOP when I say....
FREEZE!
Now, pass the beanbag lower!
Pass the beanbag hand to hand Round and round the circle Pass it lower all around
But STOP when I say....
FREEZE!
Now, pass the beanbag slower!
Pass the beanbag hand to hand Round and round the circle Pass it slower all around
But STOP when I say FREEZE
Now, pass the beanbag faster!
Pass the beanbag hand to hand Round and round the circle Pass it faster all around
But STOP when I say....
FREEZE!
We have a winner!
Come back and play again soon!

Animation done by Dream Farm Studio
*******************************************

videos.description:
Get your preschoolers moving and grooving with this fun rendition of the classic song, Teddy Bear Hokey Pokey, from The Kiboomers. Perfect for music and movement time, this song will have your little ones laughing and dancing along with their favorite cuddly teddy bears!.

Do you like Teddy Bears?
Then, I think you are going to love 
The Teddy Bear Hokey Pokey!!

You put your paws in,
you take your paws out
You put your paws in, 
and you shake them all about
You do the teddy bear pokey,
And you turn yourself around
That’s what it’s all about (grrr)

Get your teddy bear elbows ready!

You put your elbows in, 
you take your elbows out
You put your elbows in, 
and you shake them all about

you turn yourself around

You put your knees in, 
you take your knees out

you turn yourself around

You put your head, 
you take your head out

and you shake it all about
You do the teddy bear pokey, 
you turn yourself around

you take your tail out
You put your tail in, 
and you shake it all about
You do the teddy bear pokey, 
you turn yourself around

♥︎ If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then please subscribe to support our YouTube channel here : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Lion Hokey Pokey song lyrics for kids :

Ok all you lions!! 
Get up on your feet & let’s pokey!

You put your paws in, 
you take your paws out
You put your paws in, 
and you shake them all about
You do the Lion pokey,
And you turn yourself around
That’s what it’s all about! 

Roar!!

Get your elbows ready!
You put your elbows in, 
you take your elbows out
You put your elbows in, 
and you shake them all about
You do the Lion pokey,
And you turn yourself around
That’s what it’s all about! 

Roar!!

Now your knees!
You put your knees in, 
you take your knees out
You put your knees in, 
and you shake them all about
You do the Lion pokey,
And you turn yourself around
That’s what it’s all about! 

Roar!!

Now your head!
You put your head in, 
you take your head out
You put your head in, 
and you shake it all about
You do the Lion pokey,
And you turn yourself around
That’s what it’s all about! 

Roar!!
Now your whole body!
You put your whole lion in, 
you take your whole lion out
You put your whole lion in, 
and you shake yourself about
You do the Lion pokey,
And you turn yourself around
That’s what it’s all about!

That’s what it’s all about

videos.title: We're Going on a Shark Hunt - The Kiboomers Songs for Kids
videos.description:
Join us on a fun and exciting shark hunt with The Kiboomers! This catchy song for kids is perfect for singing and dancing along. Let's go on a musical adventure and see if we can find any sharks! 

♥︎ If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then please subscribe to support our YouTube channel here : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

We're Going on a Shark Hunt song lyrics for kids :

"We’re going on a shark hunt 
We’re going on a shark hunt 
I’ve got my flippers on
I’ve got my flippers on 
I’m not scared!
I’m not scared!

Oh look at all the seaweed! 
It’s so tall!

We can’t go over it 
We can’t go over it 
We can’t go under it 
We can’t go under it
We have to go through it!
Ew!!!

Swish! Swish! Swish! Swish!

We’re going on a shark hunt 
We’re going on a shark hunt 
I’ve got my flippers on
I’ve got my flippers on 
I’m not scared!
I’m not scared!

Uh-oh! It’s a giant octopus!
Look at all those legs!"

"We can’t go over it 
We can’t go over it 
We can’t go under it 
We can’t go under it 
Let’s swim around it!
Watch out for those tentacles!

Splish! Splash! Splish! Splash!"

"We’re going on a shark hunt 
We’re going on a shark hunt
I’ve got my flippers on
I’ve got my flippers on 
I’m not scared!
I’m not scared!


It’s a sunken pirate ship!
 It’s so creepy!

We can’t go over it 
We can’t go over it 
We can’t go under it 
We can’t go under it 
Let’s tiptoe into it!
Don’t trip on your flippers!

Tiptoe, Tiptoe, Tiptoe, Tiptoe!

We’re going on a shark hunt 
We’re going on a shark hunt 
I’ve got my flippers on
I’ve got my flippers on 
I’m not scared!
I’m not scared!

What’s that in the corner?
I don’t know!!

I see a big fin! 
I see a big fin!
I see some sharp teeth! 
I see some sharp teeth!

What do you think it is?! 
I know what that is!
What?
It’s shark!!!

Swim away!!!"


Quick! 
Out of the sunken pirate ship!
Tiptoe! Tiptoe! Tiptoe! Tiptoe!

Hurry! 
Swim around the octopus!!
Splish! Splash! Splish! Splash!

Keep moving! 
Back through the seaweed!
Swish! Swish! Swish! Swish!

Under the coral!
Over the sea turtle!
Up to the surface!
Into the boat!

Whew!! 
That was scary!
I have an idea?
What’s that?
Next time, let’s hunt for coconuts on the beach"

videos.description:
The Preschool Freeze Dance by The Kiboomers is the best party freeze song to get kids up and moving!  Don't be surprised if your kids ask for it again and again. A great brain break for your preschoolers, at home or in the classroom.

♥︎ If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then be sure to subscribe to our channel : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Preschool Freeze Dance song lyrics for kids

"Let’s do the Preschool Freeze Dance! 
Now remember, when I say, Freeze! 
You freeze!
And when I say March together in a line, March!!

March! 
March! 
In a line 
Marching, marching, marching,
March in line everybody please, 
But stop when I say FREEZE!

Now! Get ready to touch your toes!

Touch! 
Touch! 
Touch your toes 
Touching, touching, touching 
Touch your toes everybody please 
But stop when I say FREEZE!

Now! Let’s do some jumping jacks!

Jumping, jumping, jumping jacks 
Jumping, jumping, jumping 
Jumping jacks everybody please, 
But stop when I say FREEZE!

Now! Clap your hands behind your back!

Clap your hands behind your back 
Clapping, clapping, clapping
Clap your hands everybody please 
But stop when I say FREEZE!"

videos.title: Stop And Go Dance - The Kiboomers Kids Songs - Brain Break Exercise
videos.description:
Get up and moving with our Stop and Go song for kids! Great for a brain break exercise. Original music by The Kiboomers.

♥︎ If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then be sure to subscribe to our channel : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Stop and Go song lyrics for kids :

Let’s do the Stop and Go Song!
First, let’s all dance! 
But remember to stop when I say, Stop!

Ok!

Oh we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance, and we STOP!

Oh we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we STOP!

Oh we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we dance and we STOP!

Shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, and we STOP!

Shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, and we STOP!

Shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, shake your hips, and we STOP!

Knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees,  knock your knees, knock your knees, and we STOP!

Knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees,  and we STOP!

Knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees,  knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, knock your knees, and we STOP!

Wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears and we STOP!

Wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears and we STOP!

Wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, wag your ears, and we STOP!

Uh... we stop!
I said, we stop!
And we stop!

Thank you!

videos.description:
Stop Copying Me is a call and response song that kids will have a blast singing and dancing along to. It will work great as a brain break in the classroom.  Original music by The Kiboomers.

♥︎ If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then be sure to subscribe to our channel : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Stop Copying Me song lyrics for kids :

I’m steering the car
I’m steering the car
I’m beeping the horn
I’m beeping the horn
I’m pushing the brakes
I’m pushing the brakes
I’m waving at cars
I’m waving at cars

Stop copying me! 
Stop copying me! 
You’re copying me! 
You’re copying me! 
No, you are!
No, you are!
No, you are!
No, you are!
You!
You!
You!
Mom!!!!

I’m wiggling my fingers
I’m wiggling my fingers
I’m shaking my hands
I’m shaking my hands
I’m waving my arms
I’m waving my arms
I’m sticking out my tongue
I’m sticking out my tongue

Stop copying me! 
Stop copying me! 
You’re copying me! 
You’re copying me! 
No, you are!
No, you are!
No, you are!
No, you are!
You!
You!
You!
Mom!!!!

I’m putting fries in my mouth
I’m putting fries in my mouth
I’m sipping my drink
I’m sipping my drink
I’m banging the tray
I’m banging the tray
I put a fry in my nose
I put a fry in my nose
Stop copying me! 
Stop copying me! 
You’re copying me! 
You’re copying me! 
No, you are!
No, you are!
No, you are!
No, you are!
You!
You!
You!
Mom!!!!
 
I know you’re copying me
No! you’re copying me
No!
Yes!
No! you’re copying me
No, I know you’re copying me…

videos.description:
Your kids will LOVE this Zombie Freeze Dance!  Try this Halloween Freeze Dance at your next Halloween party or in the classroom.  Original music by The Kiboomers.

♥︎ If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then be sure to subscribe to our channel : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Zombie Freeze Dance song lyrics for kids :

 Calling all zombies!
It's the Zombie Freeze Dance!
Remember, when I say Freeze, you freeze!
But when I say Dance, Dance!!

Zombies dancing on the floor 
Dancing Dancing Dancing 
Dancing any way you please
But stop when I say, Freeze!!

Zombies! Get ready to Stumble!
Zombies stumble on the floor 
Stumble stumble stumble 
Stumble any way you please,
But stop when I say, Freeze!!

Zombies! Get ready to Zigzag!
Zombies zigzag on the floor 
Zigzag zigzag zigzag
Zigzag any way you please, 
But stop when I say, Freeze!!

Zombies! Get ready to Grunt!
Zombies grunting on the floor 
Grunt! Grunt! Grunt!
Grunting any way you please
But stop when I say, Freeze!

videos.title: It's Preschool yoga time - let's breath and learn new yoga poses together! #shorts
videos.description:
Gather the kids!  It’s Preschool Yoga Time! 
Here are 3 yoga poses that are easy, fun to do and great way to introduce yoga to kids.  Original music by The Kiboomers.

If you want us to make more Yoga videos, please subscribe and like!

Preschool Yoga song lyrics for kids :

Hello!
Are you ready to do some Yoga with me?
You are? That’s great!
First, let’s begin by sitting down on the floor and breathing deeply

Hello everybody
It’s time to some yoga 
Before we get started 
Let’s take time to breathe
Breathe in, Breathe out, Breathe in, Breathe out
Very good! 

Now that we are ready, Let’s pretend to be a mountain
Stretch, hold, and breathe... 
What a beautiful mountain! That’s great!
 
Now let’s change positions and pretend to be a tree
Balance, hold, breathe... 
What a beautiful tree you are! Good job!

Now pretend to be a dog!
Stretch, hold, breathe...

videos.title: Preschool Yoga Video - The Kiboomers - Fun and Easy Yoga Poses for Kids
videos.description:
Gather the kids!  It’s Preschool Yoga Time! 
Here are 4 yoga poses that are easy, fun to do and great way to introduce yoga to kids.  Teaching mindfulness to beginners or students is a great way to help relieve stress & anxiety or help with concentration. Original music by The Kiboomers. 

♥︎ If you want us to make more Yoga videos, please subscribe and like here - https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Preschool Yoga song lyrics for kids :

Hello!
Are you ready to do some Yoga with me?
You are? That’s great!
First, let’s begin by sitting down on the floor and breathing deeply

Hello everybody
It’s time to some yoga 
Before we get started 
Let’s take time to breathe
Breathe in, Breathe out, Breathe in, Breathe out
Very good! 

Now that we are ready, Let’s pretend to be a mountain
Stretch, hold, and breathe... 
What a beautiful mountain! That’s great!
 
Now let’s change positions and pretend to be a tree
Balance, hold, breathe... 
What a beautiful tree you are! Good job!

Now pretend to be a dog!
Stretch, hold, breathe... 
Wonderful! What a cute little doggy!

Let’s finish by pretending to be a butterfly sitting on a leaf!
Be calm, sit up nice and straight... and breathe... Very good!

Goodbye everybody
We’ve finished with our yoga We’ll see you tomorrow
And do it one more time
Goodbye!

Animation done by Dream Farm

videos.title: Knock Knock, Who's at the Door Song -  The Kiboomers Kids Songs and Nursery Rhymes
videos.description:
Who is it knocking on the door? Your kids will definitely love this version by The Kiboomers! . By looking through the peephole, have your kids try and identify the visitors at the door.  Original music by The Kiboomers.

♥︎ We love making music for kids.  If you love what we do, please subscribe to our channel: https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Knock Knock, Who’s at the Door song lyrics for kids :

Knock! Knock! Knock! 
Who’s at the door? 
Who’s at the door? 
Who’s at the door? 
Knock! Knock! Knock! 
Who’s at the door?
I wonder who it is?

I see a square head! 
I see a square head! 
I see lights blinking! 
I see lights blinking! 
I hear it beeping!
I hear it beeping!
I know who that is Who?
It’s a robot!! 
Come on in!

Knock! Knock! Knock! 
Who’s at the door? 
Who’s at the door? 
Who’s at the door? 
Knock! Knock! Knock! 
Who’s at the door?
I wonder who it is?

I see 2 large eyes!
I see 2 large eyes! 
He’s big and round! 
He’s big and round! 
He’s the color green! 
He’s the color green!
I know who that is Who?
It’s Mr. Freeze Dance! 
Come on in!

Knock! Knock! Knock! 
Who’s at the door? 
Who’s at the door? 
Who’s at the door? 
Knock! Knock! Knock! 
Who’s at the door?
I wonder who it is?

I see a red hat!
I see a red hat!
I see 2 black boots!
I see 2 black boots!
I see a white beard!
I see a white beard!

I know who that is Who?
It’s Santa Claus! Come on in!

Knock! Knock! Knock! 
Who’s at the door? 
Who’s at the door? 
Who’s at the door? 
Knock! Knock! Knock! W
ho’s at the door?
I wonder who it is?

I see a tall hat!
I see a tall hat!
He looks really happy! 
He looks really happy! 
He has a plate of muffins! 
He has a plate of muffins!
I know who that is Who?
It’s the Muffin Man! 
Come on in Muffin Man!!

videos.title: Five Red Apples | Counting Song | The Kiboomers Kids Songs and Nursery Rhymes
videos.description:
"Five Red Apples" is an engaging and interactive counting song designed to captivate young children and help them develop early math skills. Set to a catchy, repetitive tune, the song features a delightful story of five bright red apples hanging on a tree. As the song progresses, one apple at a time is taken away, allowing little ones to count down from five to zero.

The simple lyrics and cheerful melody make it easy for toddlers to follow along, while the playful repetition reinforces their counting abilities. The song encourages participation, with children counting the apples and singing along to the rhythm. It's a great way to introduce basic numeracy concepts in a fun and memorable way.

Perfect for circle time, home, or any early learning environment, "Five Red Apples" combines music, movement, and learning to create a joyful experience for young learners.

Five Red Apples song lyrics for kids :

Five red apples hanging in a tree
The juiciest apples that you ever did see.
The wind came by with a great big frown
And one little apple came tumbling down 

Four red apples, hanging in a tree,
The juiciest apples that you ever did see.
The wind came by with a great big frown
And one little apple came tumbling down

Three red apples, hanging in a tree,
The juiciest apples that you ever did see.
The wind came by with a great big frown
And one little apple came tumbling down

Two red apples, hanging in a tree,
The juiciest apples that you ever did see.
The wind came by with a great big frown
And one little apple came tumbling down

One red apple, hanging in a tree,
The juiciest apple that you ever did see.
The wind came by with a great big frown
And one little apple came tumbling down

No red apples, hanging in a tree 
I Guess mom is making
Apple pie for me!

videos.title: Emotions Finger Family Song - Happy or Sad? Exploring Feelings for Kids by The Kiboomers Kid Songs
videos.description:
The "Emotions Finger Family Song" is a delightful and educational children's rhyme that introduces young learners to a colorful array of feelings and emotions. Set to a catchy melody, each verse features a different member of the "finger family," each representing a distinct emotion.

The song starts with the familiar "Finger Family" tune, where each finger on one hand is assigned a family member role. As the song progresses, each finger is associated with an emotion such as happiness, sadness, excitement, anger, and surprise, among others.

Emotions Finger Family song lyrics for kids

Happy finger, happy finger What do you do?
I smile a lot
I laugh a lot
That’s what I do

Sad finger, sad finger What do you do?
I’m quiet a lot
I cry a lot
That’s what I do

Angry finger, angry finger What do you do?
I frown a lot
I yell a lot (stop music That’s what I do

Tired finger, tired finger What do you do?
I yawn a lot
I sleep a lot
That’s what I do

Excited finger, excited finger What do you do?
I jump a lot
I dance a lot
That’s what I do That’s what we do!

Animation done by Cecy Meade

videos.description:

"Hey there! 🌟 If you've been enjoying our content, we would be so grateful if you could hit that subscribe button and join our community here on YouTube. Your support means the world to us, and we can't wait to share more music videos with you and your family! Thanks a bunch for being awesome! 💖”

We're Going on an Alien Hunt song lyrics for kids :

We’re going on an alien hunt 
We’re going on an alien hunt 
I've got my helmet on!
I've got my helmet on!
I’m not scared! I am not scared

Uh, oh, look at all the meteors! 
You are correct, Captain
We can’t go over them
We can’t go over them
We can’t go under them
We can’t go under them
We going to have to go through them! 
We have to fly through them!
Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh!

Verse 2
We’re going on an alien hunt 
We’re going on an alien hunt
 I've got my helmet on!
I've got my helmet on!
I’m not scared!
I am not scared

Oh my! It’s a black hole! 
Affirmative!
We can’t go over it
We can’t go over it
We can’t go under it
We can’t go under it
We have to fly around it! 
Turn hard!
Turn hard! 
Turn hard! 
Turn hard! 
Turn hard!

Verse 3
We’re going on an alien hunt 
We’re going on an alien hunt 
I've got my helmet on!
I've got my helmet on!
I’m not scared! I am not scared

It’s the planet Zargon!
There appear to be life forms!
We can’t go over it 
We can’t go over it 
We can’t go under it 
We can’t go under it 
We have to land on it! 
Prepare to land!

Verse 4
We’re going on an alien hunt 
We’re going on an alien hunt I
've got my helmet on!
I've got my helmet on!
Are you scared, little buddy?
 I am not scared
What’s in that crater?
It would appear to be inhabited!
I feel an antenna! 
I feel an antenna! 
I feel a big head! 
I feel a big head!
 I feel three eyes!
 I feel three eyes!
I know what that is! 
What?!?
It is an alien!!
Back to the spaceship!!!

Verse 5
Hurry!
 Lift off!
Pull! 
Pull! 
Pull! 
Pull!
Quick, back around the black hole!
Turn hard! 
Turn hard! 
Turn hard! 
Turn hard! 
Back through the meteors!!
Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh! Whoosh!
Jump over the fence! Across the yard!

Up the stairs! Into the house! Close the door!
Phew!!
That was a close one!
Next time...
let’s just... fly to the moon Affirmative

Perfect for Halloween parties or just a fun sing-along at home!

Get in the Halloween spirit with our spooky version of Hickory Dickory Dock! Watch as the witches, vampires, mummies and more run up the clock in this fun and festive kids song and nursery rhyme.  Happy Halloween!

Hickory Dickory Dock - Halloween version - song lyrics for kids :

Hickory dickory dock
The vampire went up the clock
The clock struck one
The vampire did run
Hickory dickory dock.

Hickory dickory dock
The ghost went up the clock
The clock struck two
The ghost said "boo"
Hickory dickory dock

Hickory dickory dock
The witch went up the clock
The clock struck three
The witch laughed - "hee, hee, hee"
Hickory dickory dock

Hickory Dickory Dock
The zombie went up the clock
The clock struck four
He stomped through the door
Hickory dickory dock.

Hickory Dickory dock
The mummy went up the clock
The clock struck five
The mummy went bye bye
Hickory dickory dock.

videos.title: Wake Up Freeze Dance | The Kiboomers | Fun & Educational Kids Songs and Nursery Rhymes
videos.description:
Start your day with a fun and energetic song that will get your kids moving and grooving! Join The Kiboomers for a Wake Up Freeze Dance that's perfect for a brain break or a quick exercise session. Get ready to dance and sing along with this catchy good morning song!

♥︎ If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then be sure to subscribe to our channel : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Wake Up Freeze Dance song lyrics for kids :

Good morning, everyone! 
It’s a brand new day ! 
Let’s wake up our bodies and get ready to dance and freeze like statues. 
Ready? 
Here we go!

Stretch, stretch, stretch like a cat
Stretch, stretch, stretch like a cat
Stretch, stretch, stretch like a cat
But everyone stop when you hear…Freeze!

Great stretching, everyone! 
You did a purr-fect job stretching like a cat.
I’m so proud of you! 
Let’s shake it out and get ready for the next move!

Touch, touch, touch your toes
Touch, touch, touch your toes
Touch, touch, touch your toes
But everyone stop when you hear…Freeze!

Wow, look at those toes! 
You all did an amazing job touching your toes.
Let’s give a little wiggle and see what’s next!

Reach, reach, reach for the sky,
Reach, reach, reach for the sky,
Reach, reach, reach for the sky
But everyone stop when you hear…Freeze!

Fantastic reaching, everyone! 
You reached up so high!
Now shake out your arms and let’s get ready for the next move!

Run, run, run in place,
Run, run, run in place,
Run, run, run in place,
But everyone stop when you hear…Freeze! 

Great running everyone! 
You must be superheros!
Now shake out your legs and let’s see what comes next!

Fly, fly, fly like a superhero,
Fly, fly, fly like a superhero,
Fly, fly, fly like a superhero,
But everyone stop when you hear…Freeze!

You all were amazing superheroes!
Let’s give a cheer!!

videos.title: Winter Floor is Lava | The Kiboomers Kids Songs

Winter Floor is Lava Challenge for Kids! | Fun Indoor Playtime

Watch as the winter polar bear and his friends play the Winter Floor is Lava game! In this fun video,  they try to jump over the "hot lava" and stay safe on snowballs, icebergs, and other wintery spots. It's a fun game for kids to play inside during the cold winter days. Will they make it without falling into the lava? Come play along and join the fun!

Perfect for toddlers and preschoolers, this video is full of laughter, adventure, and safe indoor fun for the whole family! Great for winter play ideas and keeping little ones active indoors.

👉 If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then be sure to subscribe to our channel : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers

You'll have to guess

Sit down if it's cold!

Is it cold?

Stand up or

Is it hot or is it cold?

videos.title: Valentine's Day Simon Says: Toddler Dance Party with The Kiboomers
videos.description:
"Simon Says Valentine's Day Fun! | The Kiboomers Kids Hits | Toddler Music Video"

Get ready for a heart-filled adventure with The Kiboomers in this adorable Valentine's Day-themed Simon Says music video! Perfect for toddlers, this fun and interactive video features exciting Valentine’s Day actions like heart hugging, kissing, and spreading love—all while following the classic Simon Says game! Little ones will love dancing, playing, and learning as they practice listening and coordination skills in a cheerful and colorful environment.

Celebrate the season of love with this engaging and educational music video designed for toddlers to enjoy, sing along, and move to the beat! 💖💃🕺


Simons Says - Valentine's Day song lyrics for kids :

Happy Valentine’ s Day! 
We’re going to play a fun game called 'Simon Says!’
This is Simon!
SIMON: "Hello! 
Here’s how it works: 
When I say 'Simon says,' you do what Simon says. 
But if I don’t say 'Simon says,' you don’t do it. 
Let’s practice:"
Simon says…
SIMON: "Touch your nose!
Now, jump up and down!
Oops, I didn’t say 'Simon says!' 
So, don’t jump!
Are you ready?
Let’s start the game and have fun!"

VERSE 1
Simon says…
SIMON: Make a heart with your hands!
Simon says…
SIMON: Blow a kiss to someone you love!
Simon says…
SIMON: Give a thumbs up!
Now, wiggle your toes!
Only move when Simon says!
Only move when Simon says!
Let’s do it again!

VERSE 2
Simon says…
SIMON: Show me your best Valentine’s hug!
Simon says…
SIMON: Draw a big heart in the air!
Simon says…
SIMON: Give a high-five to a friend!
Now, make a silly face!
Only move when Simon says!
Only move when Simon says!
Let’s do it again!

VERSE 3
Simon says…
SIMON: Do a little dance with your arms wide open!
Simon says…
SIMON: Show your best Valentine’s smile!
Simon says…
SIMON: Clap your hands like you’re excited!
Touch your nose!
Only move when Simon says!
Only move when Simon says!
Let’s do it again!

VERSE 4
Simon says…
SIMON: Twirl around like a spinning love bug!
Simon says…
SIMON: Say “I love you” in your silliest voice
Simon says…
SIMON: Jump up and down with joy!
Shout hurray!
Only move when Simon says!

videos.description:

Shark Freeze Dance song lyrics for kids :

Hello, everyone! 
Are you ready for the Shark Freeze Dance? 
We’re going to swim, snap our jaws, glide through the water, and splash around. 
You ready? Let’s go!

Swimming, swimming through the sea,
Swimming, swimming, swimming,
Swimming any way you please,
But stop when I say… Freeze!!!

Alright! 
You did an awesome job swimming like sharks. 
Now, let’s snap our jaws!

Snapping, snapping, jaws so wide,
Snapping, snapping, snapping,
Snapping any way you please,
But stop when I say… Freeze!

Wow! That's great snapping! 
Now, let’s glide through the water!

Gliding, gliding, through the waves,
Gliding, gliding, gliding,
Gliding any way you please,
But stop when I say… Freeze!

Wonderful gliding! 
Now, let’s splash around like playful sharks!

Splashing, splashing all around,
Splashing, splashing, splashing,
Splashing any way you please,
But stop when I say… Freeze!

Great splashing, everyone! 
Give yourselves a big hand! 
Have a fin-tastic day!

videos.title: Brush Your Teeth  Song | The Kiboomers Kids Songs & Nursery Rhymes
videos.description:
Title: Brush Your Teeth Song for Kids | Fun & Easy Brushing Routine for Children| Brush, Smile Shuffle Along with The Kiboomers!

Get ready to have fun while learning how to brush your teeth with our catchy "Brush Your Teeth" song! This fun and educational video is perfect for kids aged 4-6. It teaches the importance of brushing teeth and flossing twice a day to keep them clean, healthy, and shiny!

Follow along with the simple brushing routine, where kids will learn how to brush their teeth and floss properly, from top to bottom and all around, with a fun and easy-to-remember song. This video encourages children to form healthy habits that will last a lifetime. Watch now and let’s get those pearly whites sparkling!

👉 If you want to enjoy more of our kids songs and preschool learning videos, then be sure to subscribe to our channel : https://radi.al/TheKiboomers 

Brush Your Teeth song lyrics for kids :

I’m going to brush my teeth!
Come and brush your teeth with me!
Get your toothbrush nice and wet!
Squeeze on a little bit of toothpaste!
Now we’re set!

Brush the front teeth up and down
Brush the front teeth all around
Brush the back teeth up and down
Brush the back teeth all around
Round and round and side to side
Brush the tops and brush the sides
Not too hard and not too soft
Get the food and sugar off!

Yeah! 
Great job!
Show your teeth
That you’re the boss
Now it’s time
To use that floss!

Floss your front teeth, get in between
Help those gums stay nice and clean
Floss your back teeth, that’s the way!
Fight bad breath and tooth decay!
Get that floss between your teeth
Make your breath smell nice and sweet!
Not too hard and not too soft
Get the food and sugar off!

All right!!
You’re doing great!
We’re almost done!

Now don’t forget
To brush your tongue!
Good job! 
Scrub that tongue!

Now it’s time
Rinse your mouth
Get all that foamyToothpaste out!
Smile!
